txt.en: 'What is this foolishness? Be gone, strange one.'

You have been tasked with travelling to Edoras in the Kingstead of West Rohan and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Edoras for potential visitors.
Rohirrim bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Khâtaphos believes that there may be some among the Rohirrim of Edoras who could use a tropical holiday.
'I have always wanted to see more of the world. Now is the time!'
'Does such a place truly exist? I must see it for myself!'
'Yes, I could very much use a holiday from all this!'
Completed Gathering Guests: Edoras
You see some potential visitors

'The barbarians of Rohan are no friend to the Umbari. But... neither should I consider them enemies any longer. Most especially if some wealthy horse-lord wants to spend his coin here! Who am I to deny them such an opportunity?

'Go to Edoras and there find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation to visit us here in Zír Aktar. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
You have found potential visitors in Edoras. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.

Find potential visitors in Edoras

'I will go nowhere that my horse cannot follow.'
Gathering Guests: Edoras
'Our mission here is too dire. I cannot leave,'
'Leave me alone, or I will call a guard!'
